Hellplague:

The Sweep commander slowed as the rest of her assault team exited he 
hold.  As the last of them flew out, sh signalled the strike force to 
begin re entry, which lasted  many long cycles.  After they entered 
Earth's atmosphe, they corrected thir course and made a bee line for 
the cannon, whose purpose was to destroy their master, and they 
couldn't have that.


OOC:
Maximals- You can detect the large force of Sweeps and send help to 
the cannon.

Predacons- The cannon may be taken by suprise, depending if you 
detect the minions as well.
